ModMetaData.name: TradeHelper
ModMetaData.author: TimmyLiang
ModMetaData.description:
Trade Helper is a small tool which expands the Trading Dialog and helps you trade in RimWorld. This includes: - A Wish list: a configurable list of desired items, when a trader holds any matched items, these items will be clearly highlighted so you won't miss what you seek (especially handy when you are targeting certain goods). - Items to be bought: clearly displays the items you are buying. - Items to be sold: clearly displays the items you are selling (minimise the risk selling the wrong item). - Slightly enhanced the Trading Dialog (mouse hover highlights etc). - Enhanced the Caravan Dialog so it has similar features to the Trading dialog (updated 2020/06/02).
Compatability: - Should work with most MODs as this only tweaks the Trading/Caravan UI; - Work with existing saves; - Requires Harmony. - This Mod assumes your screen resolution is wider than 1300px as it adds 300px side space to the Trading/Caravan Dialogs.
Updates: - 2020/06/03: fixed a small display issue. - 2020/06/06: fixed a mod conflict. - 2020/08/15: now supports v1.2 (not tested with Royalty though). - 2020/08/16: fixed a conflict with mod RimThemes. - 2021/07/31: now supports v1.3 (not tested with DLC as I don't have). - 2022/10/22: now supports v1.4 (not tested with DLC as I don't have).
Trade Helper是一个稍稍优化交易窗口的小工具。它的功能包括： - 愿望单：可配置的愿望清单，当商人持有你愿望单中的物品时，该物品整行会高亮显示。 - 购入物品栏：清晰地显示你准备买入的物品。 - 卖出物品栏：清晰地显示你准备卖出的物品（再也不会忘掉把人皮沙发卖掉啦！）。 - 稍微优化了交易窗口，例如增加了鼠标悬停高亮等。 - 优化了远行窗口，现在远行窗口拥有和交易窗口类似的功能（2020/06/02更新）。
兼容性： - 由于只是稍调整了交易和远行窗口的显示方式，所以应该可以兼容绝大部分Mod。 - 旧档可兼容，不需要开新档。 - 需要Harmony。 - 由于在交易和远行窗口增加了侧边栏，所以本Mod需要玩家屏幕的分辨率至少达到1300像素宽。
更新： - 2020/06/03: 修正了一个显示问题。 - 2020/06/06: 修正了一个Mod冲突问题。 - 2020/08/15: 支持1.2版本（但尚未针对Royalty版本测试过）。 - 2020/08/16: 修正了与RimThemes的Mod冲突问题。 - 2021/07/31: 支持1.3版本（但因为我没有DLC，所以尚未针对DLC测试）。 - 2022/10/22: 支持1.4版本（但因为我没有DLC，所以尚未针对DLC测试）。
